title: Star Guardian Icon
body:
Hey guys,

i did the quiz for the star guardian icon but didnt get it then!

Pls help :D

replies.body:
I to did the quiz and I never got my icon.  I tested and got Janna. I waited a few days and never got it and saw that others hadn't either off here. I read on of the reply's from riot saying that they may take some time to get like 2 to 3 weeks. well the time has passed and the event is long over. is it still possible to get m icon? I was really hoping to get it.  pls help riot thank you!!!

sincerely SHOCKTART180

It can take *up to a week* to receive the icon after taking the quiz. Sit tight and you'll have it on your account in a bit.

Let me know if you have any other questions. ^.^
it was atleast 2 weeks ago, so i dont think i will get it on the normal way... :(
Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll take a look and see what we can do. :)
Same, I took the quiz _quite_ a while ago, but I still haven't received it D:
